General.Name: Hafnia Ltd
General.Description: Hafnia Limited owns and operates oil product tankers. It operates through Long Range II, Long Range I, Medium Range (MR), Handy size, Chemical-Handy, and Chemical-MR segments. The company transports petroleum oil products, vegetable oil, and easy chemicals to national and international oil companies, and chemical companies, as well as trading and utility companies. It provides ship owning, ship-management, chartering, investment, and agency office services. The company is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
General.Address: Washington Mall Phase 2, Hamilton, Bermuda, HM 1189
